short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides security enhancements when using DRC ScoreBoard with the Google Chrome Browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The DRC ScoreBoard Chrome extension is designed to enforce security from for those using the DRC ScoreBoard application. You will not be able to use the DRC ScoreBoard application without having this extension. If you do not use the DRC ScoreBoard application, then you have no reason do not need to download this extension. Suggested usage is to activate the extension while using the application. After you have logged out, then you can may disable the extension. While active, your browserâ€™s functionality will be restricted.
long.es: Extension is designed to enforce security from those using the scoreboard application. You will not be able to use the scoreboard application without having this extension. If you do not use the DRC scoreboard application then you have no reason to download this extension. Suggested usage is to activate the extension while using the application. After you have logged out then you can disable the extension. While active your browser's functionality will be restricted.
